title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Augmented Reality-Based Cultural Heritage Mathematics Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Geometric patterns of cultural heritage artifacts can be analyzed through 3D augmented reality models, and mathematical principles can be explained via symmetry/ratio calculations
Comparing scale ratios of cultural heritage structures measured in augmented reality simulations with actual dimensions enhances problem-solving skills using proportional equations
Spatial perception and mathematical modeling abilities are evaluated through a coordinate system construction project utilizing cultural heritage spatial data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
